articles.title: How To Make an Http Request is Fun 😁
articles.descrp: making Http request using Axios Library and fetch to do this what to recive a data from server
articles.body:
Hoi! I'm Medhat 👋

I'm a Senior Software Engineer at Miro, Google Developer Expert (GDE) , Content Creator, and Coach, I'm originally from Egypt 🇪🇬 and moved to the Netherlands 🇳🇱 in 2017, and since then I'm living in Amsterdam with my lovely wife 🧕 and 3 little kids (👧👦👦) barly speak dutch 🤏

I enjoy teaching web development to people especially Frontend, In 2017 I started to make free technical videos on YouTube using my channel [+16.5k subs] (also on my Semicolon Academy yallacode [+18k subs] a bit later in 2020 ), writing technical blog posts here from time to time, also blogging about everything I'm interested in, so not necessary to be technical all the time.

I've published in February 2019 my first ever publication, a 3 hours video course with Packt publishing titled Redux Recipes that takes you from ground to sky in Redux 🚀.

Good to know about me, Aside from my passion to make fast websites and teaching people how to code, I love photography/videography 📸, reading 📚, baking 🍰, running 🏃‍♂️, and ping pong 🏓
